answers.answer: I'm still waiting for my July baby :( 39 weeks!
I'm due today. No sign of baby yet. I just can't wait to meet him or her !! Thank you I hope everything goes well for you :-D

No problem my first pregnancy was a lot like that. I was pregnant 40.5 ended up with preeclampsia and was induced. Most doctors only give you a week after your due date to let it come naturally. So this time I'm just expecting a stubborn baby. But look at it this way baby is coming very very soon. Thanks and good luck
My July baby get here tomorrow via c sec!!! Can't wait to meet him!
I'm still waiting for my July 7th baby lol.
Aww thank you so much!! It's hard to believe our son is a week old today! Where has the time gone?! I wish you all much success in this beautiful and amazing blessed journey!
Thanks. Can't believe its been a week and 1 day. She is such a joy. My biggest problem is the older kids fighting over who holds her, and them always wanting her to wake up.
38 weeks today appt today 1 cm dilated 40% effaced dr said if she doesn't come on her own then I can be induced next week:)
Aww they do grow sooo fast!

question: Just wanted to congradulate all the new July mommies! Enjoy you angels. August mommies are you ready??? Our time is coming next!
title: Congratulations all you July Mommies!
